column1: The funeral will be 4 p.m. Saturday
column4: at Arrington Heights Freewill Baptist Church
column5: with the Rev. Doug McGee and Preacher Clyde Akers officiating. Burial will follow in Forest Hill Memorial Park. The family will receive friends at the church prior to the service from 2:45 to 3:45 and other times at the home of her daughter on Wilson Street.
